meta.description: Determine the minimum cost of mixing Feed A and Feed B to meet nutritional requirements.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per kilogram of each feed.

params.name: protein_content
params.description: Protein content per kilogram of each feed.

params.name: fat_content
params.description: Fat content per kilogram of each feed.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Kilograms of each feed to use in the mixture.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the feed mixture.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the mixture contains at least 30 units of protein.

constraints.name: fat_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the mixture contains at least 50 units of fat.
